lead_paragraph: The couples suspected to be part of a Russian spy ring will be allowed to decide where their children will stay while their court cases go forward.
snippet: The couples suspected to be part of a Russian spy ring will be allowed to decide where their children will stay while their court cases go forward.

headline.main: Accused of Espionage, but Praised as Moms and Dads
headline.seo: Spies? Perhaps. Bad Parents? The Evidence Says No.
headline.print_headline: Spies? Perhaps. Bad Parents? The Evidence Says No.
